name: Through The Eyes Of A Star
name_original: Through The Eyes Of A Star
description:
Through The Eyes Of A Star is an action packed adventure full of challenging platforming and compelling design that will keep you engaged throughout every level.

Development

Through The Eyes Of A Star is my first release and by far my proudest achievement as of yet. It began development January 2018 and was originally released on July 1st 2019. To commemorate 1 year since publishing, I've updated the game and re-released it to the world.
